sentences.en: Before you go near a stockbroker, do your homework.
sentences.cn: 找股票经纪人之前，先要做好必要的准备工作。

sentences.en: But now I am a stockbroker anymore a fund manager.
sentences.cn: 不过,现在我不再是股票经纪人,而是基金经理了.

sentences.en: GEM about to open, you and your stockbroker has been prepared?
sentences.cn: 创业板即将开启, 您和您的证券经纪人是否已做好了准备?

sentences.en: He bragged that his father was the most successful stockbroker on Wall Street.
sentences.cn: 他吹嘘他父亲是华尔街上最成功的股票经纪人。

sentences.en: He give instructions to his stockbroker to sell the share immediately.
sentences.cn: 他指示他的股票经纪人马上出售股票.

sentences.en: He grew up in the comfort of the Surrey stockbroker belt.
sentences.cn: 他在萨里市郊富人聚居区的舒适环境中长大。

sentences.en: He is a young stockbroker at the New York Stock Exchange.
sentences.cn: 他是纽约证券交易所的一位年轻的经纪人.

sentences.en: He looks more like a stockbroker than a teen idol.
sentences.cn: 他看起来不像是青少年偶像，而更像个股票经纪人。

sentences.en: His father was a stockbroker, who met Oliver's French mother in Paris during the second world war.
sentences.cn: 他的父亲是个股票经纪人，在第二次世界大战时的巴黎遇见了斯通的母亲。

sentences.en: My stockbroker manages my portfolio for me.
sentences.cn: 我的证券经纪人替我管理投资组合.

sentences.en: One of my clients was a stockbroker who happened to have a little farm on the side.
sentences.cn: 哈尔佛香说。 “我的一个客户是股票经纪人，碰巧另外有个小农场。

sentences.en: One time it was a call to her stockbroker in New York.
sentences.cn: 有一次是给她在纽约的股票经纪人打电话.

sentences.en: Over the next five months, every one of them discouraged me from becoming a stockbroker.
sentences.cn: 接下来的五个月中，他们每个人都劝阻我不要做股票经纪人。

sentences.en: She works in the City, eg as a stockbroker.
sentences.cn: 她在伦敦商业区工作(如做证券经纪人).

sentences.en: The main business of stockbroker is to help clients buy and sell shares.
sentences.cn: 股票经纪人的主要业务是帮客户买卖股票.

sentences.en: The stockbroker has placed the money in industrial stock.
sentences.cn: 证券经纪人已用那笔钱购入了工业股票.

sentences.en: The young lady had been the stockbroker's secretary for a year.
sentences.cn: 年轻的秘书已为股票经纪人工作了一年.

sentences.en: They would also provide stockbroker services for the public .
sentences.cn: 他们还可以想公众提供股票经纪人的服务。

sentences.en: They would also provide stockbroker services for the public.
sentences.cn: 它们同时还会为大众提供股票经纪服务.

sentences.en: Will little brainy Bobby be the stockbroker man?
sentences.cn: 是否聪明的小鲍比会成为股票经纪人?

words.tran_cn: 股份，股票；库存；血统；树干
证券公司；[金融] 股票经纪人；股票投机商

trans.tran_en: a person or organization whose job is to buy and sell  shares  ,  bonds  etc for people
